QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Catecholamine blood test
QAPair.Answer: This test measures the levels of catecholamines in the blood. Catecholamines are hormones made by the adrenal glands. The three catecholamines are epinephrine (adrenaline), norepinephrine, and dopamine. Catecholamines are more often measured with a urine test than with a blood test.
